snippet: Charlie White, the state’s top elections official, may lose his job after being found guilty of six felony charges, including perjury, theft and voting in another precinct.
abstract: Indiana' Secretary of State Charlie White, the state's top election official, is in danger of losing his job after being found guilty of six felony charges, including perjury, theft and voting in another precinct.
lead_paragraph: Charlie White, the state’s top elections official, may lose his job after being found guilty of six felony charges, including perjury, theft and voting in another precinct.

headline.seo: Indiana Secretary of State Convicted in Voter Fraud Case
headline.main: Indiana Secretary of State Guilty of Voter Fraud
